name: Legend of Glitchrun
description:
<NOTE: THIS GAME IS A PUZZLE STRATEGY GAME. YOU CAN FIND THE WALKTHROUGH AT THE END OF THIS POST. COMPLETE THE GAME TO ENJOY ALL THE CONTENT! GIVE IT A TRY>

A magic world RPG game, full of magic, adventures... and glitches!

Apparently the game is corrupted, so the game converted itself in a escape room style game! Can you find the end of this puzzle while trying to use the glitches at your favor?

Do your best!

___

This game was created for the WOWIE GAME JAM 2.0!

The topic of the Game Jam was "Intentional Bugs".

The game is inspired in Legend of Zelda glitch speedruns and escape room style games. Now you must use the glitches to find the final boss and win the game! Can you do it?

A lot of twists are waiting you... Pay attention and think different if you want to win!

____

CONTROLS:

Arrows: Move (All directions)

Z: Action / Talk / Select

X: Attack

ESC: Menu

___

The game and all the assets used in this game were made in the 72hs (3 days) of the Wowie Game Jam. Only minor sprites (like grass and fire) were used from my other games (Paul & Tita).

___

If you find your way to the end, write me in the comments!

Hope you enjoy it! Pay attention, everything is there!

___

WALKTHROUGH

Hey! So you wanted to see the ending of the game or you can’t go to the next level?

Here are all the answers!

  1. You will spawn in the top of a house and you can’t move. If you pay attention, the debug logs told you that the pause is available but colliders are corrupted. Pause the game and the house will be invisible. Now you can move through it while the game is paused.
  2. A few NPC’s insist in a movement combinations and in the number 4. When you do the combo (left, right, attack) and your character will be bugged! It will move at full speed and will destroy things that are “invisible to the eyes”. A character in the lower left corner of the screen said that the essential to the eyes is real and other woman told you to go by the trees. Go to the left  and there’s a bunch of trees. You will see that they are invisible at pause. “Invisible to the eyes”. Now execute the combo to bug the player and go over them! The trees will be destroyed. Now move between the trees and you will go to the next level.
  3. You are in a new house and characters are talking about the Phoenix Tears that will guide you to Lia. The item manager is broken so chests are spawning all over the map. Collect them until you find the item. Now you can use it from the main menu. Select it and you will go to level 3.
  4. In level three there’s a caos. A lot of monsters are destroying the city but when you destroy them, more appear! NPC’s told that immortality gets you crazy. If you check your life, you can’t die. Now become crazy while doing the combo again and you will warp to level 4.
  5. Lia is broken and she knows it. She is blaming you for crashing their world. She will follow you while screaming. If you use the pause menu trick you will found a sign under a house. The sign says “Kill her”. So slam Lia with your sword till you go to next level.
  6. There’s a golden door. You need 10 keys to go through it. If you don’t have enough, more chests will spawn. But take care! There’s no colliders, so you can get lost if you go so far away from the door! Once you have 10 keys (or if you already had them from the last chest spawning) talk to the door and a shower of stars will guide you. You will find Lia again. Talk to her and you will go to the next level.
  7. And here we are! The final boss fight. Here you only must destroy the boss. But… Is the main core the real boss? Check which one of the 3 parts is the real boss and attack till it dies!
  8. Congratulations! You finished! Thank you for playing the game!

Please write your thoughts in the comments!
Hope you enjoyed it!
